Album Notes: Personnel includes: Faudel (vocals); Delta (rap vocals); M (guitar, keyboards, bass); Xavier Derouin (guitar); Fahrat Bovallagui (violin); Patrick Goraguer (piano, keyboards, drums, programming); Lucien Athanase (keyboards, programming); Samir Bouchakara (keyboards); Willy Nfor (bass);

Engineers include: Dijimmy Finger, Phillippe Weiss, Steve Hillage.
Recorded at Studio De La Seine, Studio Gang, Paris, France; Eden Studios, London, England.
